contentfulLocationPage.heading: Berlin

content.value: TechLabs started in 2017 in MÃ¼nster with a clear idea of the impact it wanted to create in the world. As we moved forward, we came to the point in which we wanted to influence more diverse and more creative cities and communities. And Berlin was the perfect answer for that. The combination of the StartUp culture, the incredibly colorful city and an engaged founding team makes truly solidifies our presence and motivation to be in Berlin.

contentfulLocationPage.secondEntryTitle: What are we going to do at TechLabs Berlin?

content.value: We at TechLabs & TechLabs Berlin dream of a world with no digital illiterates. A world full of technically savvy people who face the challenges of our time with a digital and entrepreneurial mindset. During the 6-month program in either Data Science, Web Development, Artificial Intelligence or UX Design, the TechLabs Berlin community will work on online courses, take part in community events, learn from unique workshops with our corporate partners and develop their own hands-on coding projects to translate the technical into the practical.

contentfulLocationPage.thirdEntryTitle: Here's is how we're going to do it
contentfulLocationPage.thirdEntrySubtitle: And why we're looking for inspiring individuals

content.value: What's a community without its individuals? The core element of the success of TechLabs Berlin is our inspiring and visionary students. Transparent communication, productive feedback and a growth mentality are part of our core principles. Our blended learning program motivates students to work together in order to accomplish even larger goals. Needless to say, the people we're going to meet, and the friends we're going to make on the way will make this experience even more fulfilling. Apply now!
